#summary Ready-to-use dumps for DSwiki.
#labels Featured

On this page, pre-made and ready to use database dumps for DSwiki are available for download. If you have compiled your own dump and want to share it with other users, drop me a note and I will list it on this page.

= Dumps =

||The complete German Wikipedia (2008/07/12)|| http://ftp5.gwdg.de/pub/wikipedia/nintendo/de/dewiki-20080712.tar.gz (1.1GB)||
||The complete English Wikipedia (2008/07/24)|| http://dswiki.googlecode.com/files/DSwiki-enwiki-20080724.torrent (3.5GB)||
||German Wikiquotes|| http://ftp5.gwdg.de/pub/wikipedia/nintendo/de/dewikiquote-20080613.tar.gz (5.3MB)||

Just to test DSwiki, download one of the smaller dumps first.
